description: This file implements the `ProviderRegistry` class, which manages registration, unregistration, resolution, and removal of providers based on capabilities in a plugin framework. It provides thread-safe access to a map of capabilities to provider contexts.

classes.name: ProviderRegistry
classes.description: A class that manages provider registration based on capabilities, ensuring thread safety and consistency.

methods.name: bool Register(const string & capability,const ProviderContext & ctx,const bool lastWins,string & outError)
methods.description: Registers a provider capability with its context, with an option to prioritize new entries if duplicate exists.

methods.name: bool Unregister(const string & capability,const string & ownerAppId,string & outError)
methods.description: Removes a provider capability registered by a specific application, verifying ownership.

methods.name: bool Resolve(const string & capability,ProviderContext & out) const
methods.description: Finds and retrieves the provider context associated with a specific capability.

methods.name: void RemoveByApp(const string & appId)
methods.description: Removes all capabilities registered by a specific application ID.

ctags.name: Register
ctags.pattern: /^bool ProviderRegistry::Register(const string& capability, const ProviderContext& ctx, const bool/
ctags.signature: (const string & capability,const ProviderContext & ctx,const bool lastWins,string & outError)

ctags.name: Resolve
ctags.pattern: /^bool ProviderRegistry::Resolve(const string& capability, ProviderContext& out) const {$/

ctags.name: Unregister
ctags.pattern: /^bool ProviderRegistry::Unregister(const string& capability, const string& ownerAppId, string& ou/
